scenes.description: Hakos Baelz performs her original song "Play Dice!" on stage.
Transition interlude with a dark screen and stage preparation.
Tokino Sora, Sakura Miko, AZKi, Robocosan, and Hoshimachi Suisei perform "Survival-v" together.
